message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal for both of us, as it's well below what it's worth to me and still provides you with a good value. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a budget in mind and I'd love to see if we can meet in the middle.

Bob, I understand you have a budget, and I appreciate your interest in the product. While $12,000 is significantly lower than my minimum price, I'm willing to come down a bit. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500? This would still allow me to get a decent price and give you a great deal on a valuable product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $13,000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm really interested in the product, so I'm hoping we can make a deal at this price.
